title: Brooklyn Pride
description: A series of events celebrating Brooklyn Pride at various locations. Join the festivities throughout the week.

title: Gayridge Pride at Owl’s Head Park
description: A pride celebration at Owl’s Head Park in Bay Ridge. Join the community for a day of festivities.

title: Annual Pride Makers Market
description: A market event at Footlight Underground at the Windjammer in Ridgewood celebrating pride with various vendors.
address: Footlight Underground at the Windjammer, Ridgewood

title: Woof Fest: Paws for Pride
description: A pride-themed event at Manhattan West Plaza featuring activities for dogs and their owners. A fun day for pet lovers.

title: Pride Pop-Up Market
description: A market event at Caffeine Underground in Bushwick celebrating pride with various vendors and activities.

title: The 5th Blasian Pride March
description: A pride march at Cadman Plaza in Brooklyn Heights/Downtown Brooklyn. Join the celebration of blasian pride.

title: First Saturday at Brooklyn Museum: Star-Makers
description: An event at the Brooklyn Museum featuring various activities and exhibitions. A great way to enjoy art and culture.

title: Support Women DJs
description: An event at the Sultan Room rooftop in Bushwick supporting women DJs. Expect a vibrant atmosphere with music and community support.

title: Welcome to Dykea: Queer Comedy Show
description: A queer comedy show at The Bush in Bushwick featuring various comedians. Expect laughter and a fun atmosphere.

title: A Lively Mind: Jane Austen at 250
description: An exhibition at The Morgan Library + Museum dedicated to Jane Austen featuring artifacts and manuscripts.
address: The Morgan Library + Museum, Murray Hill
cost: $25 general, $17 seniors, $13 students, free Fridays 5-8pm (with RSVP)

title: Sunlight with Nina Conti
description: Screenings of comedian Nina Conti's feature-length debut at Quad Cinema, with Q&A sessions.

title: Astoria Park Carnival
description: The annual Astoria Park Carnival featuring rides, games, and food under the Robert F. Kennedy Bridge. A fun event for families.

title: New York Philharmonic Free Concerts in the Parks
description: Free outdoor concerts by the New York Philharmonic at various parks, featuring fireworks and live music.
address: Prospect Park, Brooklyn; Cunningham Park, Queens; St. George Theatre, Staten Island
